summary: The implementation successfully addresses both requirements. REQ-45 CSS fixes for z-index and overflow visibility have been applied in frontend/src/index.css with the exact specified values (z-index: 9999 for select, z-index: 99999 for dropdown content, overflow: visible for parent containers). REQ-46 height constraint for 3 visible items has been implemented in frontend/src/pages/Transaction.tsx using max-h-[calc(3*2.5rem)] with overflow-y-auto on the SelectContent component.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional z-index styling for [role='combobox'] and [data-radix-select-trigger] elements with z-index: 50
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specified z-index: 9999 for select elements only. The implementation added intermediate z-index: 50 for combobox/trigger elements which was not requested in REQ-45.
